@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2013 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Romeo Kenfack Tsakem (rkenfack) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This is a widget that enhances an HTML table with some basic features like Sorting and Filtering.

CSS Classes

Class Name Applied to Description
qx-table Table element Identifies the Table widget
qx-table-cell Table cell (td) Identifies and styles a cell of the widget
qx-table-header Table header (th) Identifies and styles a header of the table widget
qx-table-row-selection Table cell (td) Identifies and styles the cells containing the inputs for the row selection
qx-table-selection-input input Identifies and styles input element to select a table row
qx-table-input-label Label element (label) Identifies and styles label contained in the selection cell. This label can be used to create custom inputs
qx-table-row-selected Selected row (tr) Identifies and styles the selected table rows
qx-table-sort-asc Table header (th) Identifies and styles the header of the current ascendant sorted column
qx-table-sort-desc Table header (th) Identifies and styles the header of the current descendant sorted column

@description.name: @description
@description.body: caseSensitive Determines if the string sorting/filtering should be case sensitive or not. Default value : false. rowSelection Defines the row selection type. Possible values are : 'none', 'single', 'multiple'. Default value : none.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
columnDefault The Default cell template for all the table columns. Default value : 

   
     

       
     

   "

To define a custom template for a specific name use setTemplate('colname', template) or use
setTemplate('columnDefault', template) to set one template for all your table columns.
